alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 2:10PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Little River at Newborn Road near Newborn affecting Newton and Morgan Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little River at Newborn Road near Newborn. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of woodlands and the natural flood plain of the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Newborn Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 11.9 feet and rising slowly. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 215 AM EST.
